info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 02 at 3:25AM EST until January 02 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Vermont, Western Windham and Bennington Counties. In New York, Northern Saratoga, Southern Washington and Southeast Warren Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Rain showers will change to a wintry mix of sleet and freezing rain after daybreak and eventually change to all snow by the afternoon into the early evening hours today with falling temperatures into the teens and 20s tonight into Monday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
